title: Worst match I have ever had in Oce
body:
Just had a normal game with my friends few minutes ago, which was the worst one I have ever had in Oce.
When we got into match I called jg, then one of the guy called [REMOVED] kept typing jg after me and then just pick the toxic lee!
So I thought it's ok, just two jg, so what.
Then when we got into the game, he kept ks my ever neuts. So I went to mid coz morg dc. Then he came to mid and ks the minions.
Whatever, then I went to gank, he just followed and watched my friend and I died, then went for ks.
He was duoing with his friend called [REMOVED] and kept lying to the other side that I'm toxic and even talking offensive.
I know this is not even a rank game, and probably lots of people deal with this kind of situation before,
but I have never had a bad game like this before.
I don't think report in game works for this kind of people because they won't get banned at all,
and they will still be toxic in other games and make others feel terrible.
Wish riot can do something. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: I feel you, got a chat restriction once because 3 people were doing that triple queue and lying up a storm about it, and because they did that ks and all that, and because it was 3v1 (other person dc) so yea, obvious the game didn't get checked it was just a punishment from nothing, quit playing the game after another 10 or so matches with similar people, got sick of it.
Reporting in post game is still the best way for people like this to see justice. It's worth noting that any information you can provide in the comment section of your report is useful.
